LanguageData.ARA_Medicine.label: Arachne healing element
LanguageData.ARA_Medicine.description: This medicine is produced from Arachne cocoons and has the same effect as regular medicines, but it must be kept refrigerated.
LanguageData.ARA_PheromoneSolvent.label: arachne pheromone solvent
LanguageData.ARA_PheromoneSolvent.description: This is a synthetic chemical that mimics the pheromones used within the Arachne group to distinguish between friend and foe.When injected regularly, it tricks the parasites within the host, inducing them into a symbiotic dormancy state and suppressing their deadly reproductive behavior.
